Title: Requires certain pedestrian crosswalks and ramps to be clearly marked and painted in N.Y. city
Summary: Requires certain pedestrian crosswalks and ramps, those not located at street intersections, to be clearly marked and painted in any city with a population of one million or more.
LawCode: Add ยง19-112.1, NYC Ad Cd
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to clearly marking certain pedestrian crosswalks in any city having a population of one million or more persons
